summary.span: 命名空间提供了统一的访问和用户操作、计算机和组安全原则（在多个主要存储）：活动目录域服务 (AD DS)、 活动目录轻量级目录服务 (AD LDS）和机器 SAM （MSAM）。

span.span: The namespace provides uniform access and manipulation of user, computer, and group security principals across the multiple principal stores: Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS), Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS), and Machine SAM (MSAM).

summary.span: 管理独立于 命名空间的目录对象。

span.span: manages directory objects independent of the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理的目录服务应用程序可以充分利用API 来简化管理用户、 计算机和组主体。Managed directory services applications can take advantage of the API to simplify management of user, computer and group principals. 以前需要执行的应用商店或较长的代码，例如查找用户所属的所有组的复杂知识的解决方案中的代码的几行完成API。Solutions that previously required intricate knowledge of the store or lengthy code, such as finding all groups to which a user belongs, are accomplished in a few lines of code with the API. 以下功能都位于API:The following features are available on the API: - 基本目录操作，如创建和更新安全主体进行了简化。Basic directory operations such as creating and updating security principals is simplified. 应用程序需要较少方面的基础存储区中，若要执行这些操作知识。The application requires less knowledge of the underlying stores to perform these operations. - 应用程序可以扩展对象模型，以便包括新类型的目录对象。Applications can extend the object model to include new types of directory objects. - 帐户管理任务，例如启用和禁用的用户帐户，而得到简化。Account management tasks, such as enabling and disabling a user account, are simplified. - 跨应用商店支持允许在 Active Directory 域服务 (AD DS)、 Active Directory 轻型目录服务 (AD LDS) 和机器 SAM (MSAM) 数据库，以包含来自不同类型的存储的成员的组对象。Cross-store support allows group objects in the Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS), Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS), and Machine SAM (MSAM) databases to contain members from different types of stores. - 查询通过示例搜索，可在上找到类，使应用程序能够在主体对象上设置属性和其他包含的对象匹配的属性值所选的应用商店中搜索。Query by example searching, available on the class, enables applications to set properties on a principal object and search the selected store for other objects that contain matching property values. - 计算机、 用户和组主体对象上的增强的搜索使应用程序可以搜索匹配的主体对象所选的商店。Enhanced search on computer, user and group principal objects enables applications to search the selected store for matching principal objects. - 递归搜索，可用组主体对象，使应用程序组以递归方式搜索和返回仅是叶节点的主体对象。Recursive search, available on the group principal object, enables applications to search a group recursively and return only principal objects that are leaf nodes. - 简化对机 SAM、 AD DS 和 AD LS 存储的凭据验证。Credential validation against the Machine SAM, AD DS, and AD LS stores is simplified. - 通过使用快速并发绑定 （前端总线） 功能可用时提高连接速度。Connections speeds are increased by using the Fast Concurrent Bind (FSB) feature when available. 连接缓存减少了使用的端口数。Connection caching decreases the number of ports used.
